title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: It was early on Monday morning, in the cold month of March, Anno Domini1683, that the farm-house of Barjarg, in the parish of Keir and county ofDumfries, was surrounded by dragoons.
